## Abiotic Indicators
```{r}
abiotic_quadrat.df


# Decopmosition
ggplot(aes(x=site, y=decomposition, col = site),
       data = abiotic_filterpaper.df) + 
  geom_boxplot() +
  ggtitle("Decomposition") +
  theme_project() +
  scale_colour_manual(values = colours.site) +
  xlab("Site") +
  ylab("Decomposition")

# LAI
ggplot(aes(x=site, y=lai, col = site),
       data = abiotic_canopycover.df) + 
  geom_boxplot() +
  ggtitle("Leaf Area Index (Canopy Cover)") +
  theme_project()+
  scale_colour_manual(values = colours.site) +
  xlab("Site") +
  ylab("Leaf Area Index")


# Compaction
ggplot(aes(x=site, y=compaction, col = site),
       data = abiotic_penetrometer.df) + 
  geom_boxplot() +
  ggtitle("Penetrometer") +
  theme_project()+
  scale_colour_manual(values = colours.site) +
  xlab("Site") +
  ylab("Compaction")

```
